DataElement.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Administered Integer::0 Decimal Place Milligram per Kilogram Planned Total Daily Dose
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The 0 decimal place numeric milligram per kilogram planned total daily dose of therapy that was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: 0 Decimal Place Milligram per Kilogram Planned Total Daily Dose
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::0_An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers._A unit of a mass fraction expressed as a number of milligrams of substance per kilogram of mixture. The unit is also used as a dose calculation unit._To devise, contrive, or form in design._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._Occurring or done each day._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Integer::0 Decimal Place Milligram per Kilogram Plan Total Daily Dose
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::0:An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.:A unit of a mass fraction expressed as a number of milligrams of substance per kilogram of mixture. The unit is also used as a dose calculation unit.:To devise, contrive, or form in design.:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:Occurring or done each day.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.
A unit of a mass fraction expressed as a number of milligrams of substance per kilogram of mixture. The unit is also used as a dose calculation unit.
To devise, contrive, or form in design.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
